trans-unit.source: Reads return values from XML that is encoded in the body of incoming responses for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> and other classes in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols> namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> e outras classes de <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols> namespace oferece suporte às implementações do .NET Framework do Web services por meio de operações de HTTP GET e POST HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams.
trans-unit.target: Os leitores e gravadores de serviço web serializar e desserializar, respectivamente, entre os parâmetros ou objetos de retorno de métodos Web e os fluxos de solicitação ou resposta HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard.
trans-unit.target: Os leitores e gravadores de serviço da web usam o HTTP para o transporte, mas não trocam mensagens usando o padrão SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> class implements the client-side reading of XML documents into Web method return values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> valores de retorno da classe implementa documentos no lado do cliente de leitura de XML para o método da Web.

trans-unit.source: The XML documents are encoded in the body of HTTP responses.
trans-unit.target: Os documentos XML são codificados no corpo de respostas HTTP.

trans-unit.source: You typically will not need to use <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> directly.
trans-unit.target: Você normalmente não precisará usar <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> diretamente.

trans-unit.source: Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute> to each Web method and sets the attribute's <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader>.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, quando a ferramenta Wsdl.exe gera o código de proxy do cliente de acordo com as implementações de HTTP GET ou POST HTTP, ela se aplica a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute> para cada método Web e define o atributo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader" /> class.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.
Returns an initializer for the specified method.
An initializer for the specified method.
An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the Initialize method.
trans-unit.target: Um inicializador é um objeto passado como um parâmetro para o método Initialize.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> class, the initializer is an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> object for the return type of the Web method.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> o inicializador de classe, é um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> objeto para o tipo de retorno do método da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.GetInitializer%2A> method is invoked during service initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.GetInitializer%2A> método é chamado durante a inicialização do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Later, at the time a response is processed, the initializer object is passed to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Initialize%2A> method of another <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> instance.
trans-unit.target: Posteriormente, quando uma resposta é processada, o objeto de inicializador é passado para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Initialize%2A> método de outra <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> instância.

trans-unit.source: The other instance performs the actual reading.
trans-unit.target: A outra instância executa a leitura real.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> that specifies the Web methods for which the initializers are obtained.
Returns an array of initializer objects corresponding to an input array of method definitions.
An array of initializer objects corresponding to an input array of method definitions.
An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the Initialize method.
trans-unit.target: Um inicializador é um objeto passado como um parâmetro para o método Initialize.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> class, the initializer is an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> object for the return type of the Web method.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> o inicializador de classe, é um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> objeto para o tipo de retorno do método da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.GetInitializers%2A> method is invoked during service initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.GetInitializers%2A> método é chamado durante a inicialização do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Later, at the time a response is processed, the initializer object for each Web method is passed to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Initialize%2A> method of another <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> instance.
trans-unit.target: Posteriormente, quando uma resposta é processada, o objeto de inicializador de cada método Web é passado para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Initialize%2A> método de outra <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> instância.

trans-unit.source: The other instance performs the actual reading.
trans-unit.target: A outra instância executa a leitura real.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> for the return type of the Web method being invoked.
Initializes an instance.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Initialize%2A> method supplies the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> object used by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Read%2A> method to deserialize an XML document contained in the HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Initialize%2A> método fornece o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> objeto usado pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Read%2A> método para desserializar um documento XML contido na resposta HTTP.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Initialize%2A> method is invoked at the time a request is processed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Initialize%2A> método é invocado quando uma solicitação é processada.

trans-unit.source: The input parameter, `o`, is obtained by calling the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.GetInitializer%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.GetInitializers%2A> method on another instance during client initialization.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de entrada, `o`, é obtida chamando o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.GetInitializer%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.GetInitializers%2A> método em outra instância durante a inicialização do cliente.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> object containing the output message for an operation.
A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> whose content is the body of the HTTP response represented by the <c>response</c> parameter.
Gets a return value deserialized from an XML document contained in the HTTP response.
A return value deserialized from an XML document contained in the HTTP response.

To deserialize the XML content of the HTTP response, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> class's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Read%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> object passed as an argument to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para desserializar o conteúdo XML de resposta HTTP, o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader> implementação da classe do <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Read%2A> método usa o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> objeto passado como um argumento para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader.Initialize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: It throws an exception if the HTTP response's MIME content type is not `text/xml`.
trans-unit.target: Ele gera uma exceção se o tipo de conteúdo de MIME da resposta HTTP não é `text/xml`.

trans-unit.source: The method closes the response before returning the deserialized Web method return value.
trans-unit.target: O método fecha a resposta antes de retornar o valor de retorno do método Web desserializado.
